And the folks down there have done and are doing an excellent job": The heartbreaking thing with respect to GuantÃ¡namo is not that there is anything wrong with that; it is one of the finest prison systems in the world. What is awkward is the fact that for whatever reason the Administration was incapable of persuading people that that was a first-class operation, that they were not torturing people, they were not hurting people.
